extends java.lang.Object

    Title: DoubleMatrixInit

    Description: A set of methods for creating a matrix of doubles

      • vector

        public static double[][] vector(double[] x)
        Creates a matrix from the given vector. The matrix will have dimension n b 1 where element [i][0] will correspond with element x[i] of the vector
        Parameters:
        x - Vector used for creating a matrix from it
        Returns:
        The matrix version of the given vector (column vector)
